topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54afedb16368721315112200#post_54afedb16368721315112200
Shit I heard about that, I liked that show but never finished it!

Yeah apparently they Canceled Megas XLR on a Wimb. 

I was watching a stream on twitch and one of the guys named Simmons from that stream was talking about how he got into a conversation with like a Cartoon Network executive.

He told her one of his fav shows was Megas XLR and she literally said quote on quote "Wait you liked that show?" and he goes "Uuuuh yeah! A lot of people liked that show!" And she literally was like "Really?"

So apparently Cartoon fucking network wasn't even PAYING ATTENTION TO THE AUDIENCE! THEY JUST DECIDED TO CANCEL IT!

topics.body:
!http://puu.sh/akphL/225abd4d4c.png!
!http://puu.sh/akpjN/9698343917.png!

"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af8d38636872723b340a00#post_54af8d38636872723b340a00

In the book "the Time Machine", there are the warlocks and the loi... These are two separate species both derived from humans. The warlocks, however, are different from the eloi. The warlocks are blood thirsty beasts who have white fur (which are pretty smexy and I'd probably bang). These creatures evolved from the lower class of humankind (for the sake of argument, the minorities, as this guy in the comment put it) who worked in mines all day, everyday. As time went on, they became more and more adapted to the underground conditions, excellent eyesight (or maybe not I dont remeber), have super strength, fast, (sexy), can jump high, extremely good hearing, and smelling too. These creatures reside underground.

NOWOWWOWOWOOW the Eloi (or for the sake of argument, the white people) evolved from the rich, upper class of human kind. As time went on they became weaker and weaker until they became a species that is puerile both physically and in mentality. This species is so weak because over the course of 800,000 years, the Eloi/upper class lived in luxury and safety never subjected to the harshness of nature, losing all skills of survival etc..

At one point within the 800,000 years, there was a utopian society where both classes lived together in harmony (I think they were still human during that time), but the class-utopia was soon shattered after the lower class humans started losing their sense of humanity being underground for most of their lives and at that time the rich became more greedy (I think) and weaker. The now what we call warlocks were able to rise up against this new, fragile species. 800,000 years later the Eloi are a frightened and scared species, childish, and afraid of the night. The warlocks, once the lower-class servants, come out at night, every night, and hunt and feast on the ones who were once their masters: the eloi.
